ComicInfo.Summary:
With the occupation of New Caprica taking a deadly turn, the stage is set for Twilight Command’s mission: Infiltrate the Cylon factory and level it to the ground. There’s only one question: Are they up to the challenge?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Brent Schoonover & Alberto Silva | 1 | B | Cover B | Breno Tamura & Dijjo Lima | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Brent Schoonover | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Breno Tamura & Dijjo Lima | 4 | E/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Brent Schoonover & Alberto Silva | 5 | Note: The events of this issue take place concurrently with Season 3 of Battlestar Galactica.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 11:07:50. [CVDB707452] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 08:37:34. [Issue ID 1955519]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alberto Jorge Silva,Breno Tamura,Brent Schoonover,Dijjo Lima
